item.title: Trusted domains
item.description: Trusted domainsTrusted domains allows you to identify domains that should be exempted from Area 1 detections. ​​ Default behavior When messages come to your recipients from certain domains, Area 1 triggers certain detections by default: Proximity Domains: Domains with similar spelling to your existing domain. Will trigger a Spoof detection. Recent Domains: Domains created recently (exact definition set in Added Detections). Will trigger a Malicious or Suspicious detection. However, sometimes those domains are legitimate.
